name: Senti-Space
description:
Senti-Space is a space RTS, where you play as the sentiet robots "Sentis" (place holder).

Controls

Units

  • B - return to base
  • Space - select army
  • Hold left mouse button - select units
  • Right mouse button - move selected units

Camera

  • Wasd + arrow keys - movement
  • Mouse scroll wheel - zoom
  • X - switch between fullscreen
  • Z - toggle screen sizes
